sources.title: Cathy's Curse
sources.description: Title: Cathy's Curse Summary: A young girl is possessed by the spirit of her aunt, who died, as a child, in a car accident. Soon, people around her begin to mysteriously die off. Directed by: Eddy Matalon Actors: Alan Scarfe, Beverly Murray, Randi Allen Production Company: Les Productions Agora Release Date: July 1980 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 A young girl is possessed by the spirit of her aunt, who died, as a child, in a car accident. Soon, people around her begin to mysteriously die off.

sources.title: Cathy's Curse (1977)
sources.description: A young girl is possessed by the spirit of her dead aunt, who died in a car accident. Soon members of her family begin to mysteriously die off. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/cathys-curse-1977/

metadata.Plot: A young girl is possessed by the spirit of her aunt, who died as a child in a car accident. Soon, people around her begin to mysteriously die off.
metadata.Writer: Alain Sens-Cazenave, Eddy Matalon, Myra Clément
metadata.Actors: Alan Scarfe, Beverly Murray, Randi Allen
